traits.name: Far Realm Parasite
entries: Inside the lich's torso dwells a wormlike parasite that contains the lich's soul. When the lich dies, it implodes into the parasite, which then vanishes into the Far Realm. In {@dice 2d4} days, the parasite causes the lich to reappear within {@dice 1d4} miles of where it died. If the lich died inside a magic circle cast to contain Undead, the lich instead reappears as an {@creature otyugh} with all the lich's memories.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The lich doesn't need air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The lich makes one Parasitic Tentacle attack or uses Spellcasting. The lich also uses Psychic Whisper twice.

actions.name: Parasitic Tentacle
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 25 (6d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 25 (6d6 + 4 damage) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. The {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The third time the target fails the save, the target dies and dissolves into a {@creature gibbering mouther} that obeys the lich and uses the target's initiative.

actions.name: Psychic Whisper
entries: The lich targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 25 (6d6 + 4 damage) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the lich's next turn as incomprehensible whispers fill the target's mind.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lich casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):
